# uniteScrapeR

This package takes a list of scientific names for fungi and queries INSD and UNITE grabbing the available metadata and the sequences from the database. Currently the package uses a visible Selenium-driven Chrome session. It will open a browser window while it runs. Feed a list of species names into the function and it will return sequences and metadata info.

# install devtools if needed
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dylanstephen-s/uniteScrapeR")

library(uniteScrapeR)
library(cli)

# Usage
dataframe <- scrape_by_species(c("Caloplaca albolutescens", "Lobaria pulmonaria"),
                              delay_seconds = 1.2, # OPTIONAL
                              max_variants = 20, # OPTIONAL
                              max_pages = 50) # OPTIONAL
